description: GRAB application(wordpress) and system level metrics

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_packets"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_packets"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_dropped"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_dropped"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_errors"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_errors"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("engine_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_image", "engine_host" fill(none)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^ip-/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^ip-/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(inodes_free) as "free", mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^ip-/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

title: GRAB - Application, System Metrics
